name: Legacy of Hope - Alabama
notes: OPO executives sentenced to [Federal prison](https://archives.fbi.gov/archives/birmingham/press-releases/2012/former-alabama-organ-center-executive-sentenced-for-fraud) in 2012 for fraud; included in [House Committee on Oversight and Reform investigation](https://oversight.house.gov/news/press-releases/oversight-subcommittee-launches-investigation-into-poor-performance-waste-and)

name: Donor Network of Arizona
notes: [OIG](https://oig.hhs.gov/oas/reports/region9/91102035.pdf) found the OPO overstating organ procurement costs and not reporting proceeds from the sale of research organs. 2019 CEO compensation increased by 17.6% from 2018.

name: OneLegacy
notes: [OIG](https://oig.hhs.gov/oas/reports/region9/91102035.pdf) found wasteful spending; OPO also subject of 2019 [LA Times investigation](https://www.latimes.com/business/la-fi-how-body-brokers-took-over-county-morgue-20190408-story.html) into tissue processing business; Board Chair paid $100,000 annually; included in [House Committee on Oversight and Reform investigation](https://oversight.house.gov/news/press-releases/oversight-subcommittee-launches-investigation-into-poor-performance-waste-and)
